events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit me at all. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
System identified the issue as related to refund due to customer's request for return and money back.
The case has been assigned to support agent Emily for handling the refund request efficiently.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you would like to return your jacket and receive a refund. I'll be glad to assist you with this.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 8745123. The jacket is brand new, tags are still attached, and I haven't worn it at all.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly. Once we receive the item, we will process your refund within 3-5 business days.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate the quick response and clear instructions.
We have sent the prepaid return label to your email. Please ship the jacket back at your earliest convenience to complete the refund process.
Just checking in to confirm you received the return label and to see if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I received the label and shipped the jacket yesterday. Thanks again for your help!
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund successfully. You should see the amount credited to your account shortly.
We value your feedback. Please take a moment to complete a short survey regarding your recent refund experience.
I completed the survey and am very satisfied with the prompt and helpful service provided. Thank you!
The refund case is now closed. Please do not hesitate to contact us again if you need any further assistance.
